title: New Emulators
description: Citra for Nintendo 3DS and Ryujinx for Nintendo Switch.

title: CloudSync
description:
Sync your saved games between other EmuDecks installation, on your Steam Deck, another Windows PC, etc..
This is a beta release, so make sure you have a backup of your saves before enable this feature.
You can find it in Tools & Stuff.
Make sure you never close the emulator using the Steam Menu as this will prevent CloudSync to upload your files. Use the START + SELECT combo or Alt + F4

title: Controller improvements
description:
Added Steam Input profiles for Playstation and Xbox Controllers.
This enables the SELECT + START combo to exit any emulator.
You need to follow this instructions to activate the new Steam Input.
This is mandatory in order for Cloud Sync to work properly with Yuzu, Citra and Ryujinx.

title: Controller instructions
description: Yuzu, Citra and Ryujinx can't have their controller automatically configured so we've added a new tutorial page right after you install EmuDeck.

title: Bug fixes
description:
Custom reset/install shows same level of customization than EmuDeck for SteamOS
Improved Emulator installation and configuration from Manage Emulators
New PCSX2 path installation - You might need to manually copy your saved games and states from the old PCSX2 folder to the new PCSX2-Qt
Added missing Hotkeys for Dolphin, PCSX2 and Duckstation
